document.full_text: a bomb attack against an iraqi oil storage depot set one tank ablaze on sunday in a rare assault on strategic southern oilfields, but the country's crude exports were unaffected, iraqi oil officials and police said.
document.title: bombs hit iraq oil tanks in rare southern attack
lines_and_colors: a bomb attack against an iraqi oil storage depot set one tank ablaze on sunday in a rare assault on strategic southern oilfields, but the country's crude exports were unaffected, iraqi oil officials and police said.
